thread.title: Tate knocks off Escambia, eyes district title game
thread.title_full: Tate knocks off Escambia, eyes district title game

title: Tate knocks off Escambia, eyes district title game
text: Tate knocks off Escambia, eyes district title game Matt Foster, mrfoster@pnj.com 12:31 a.m. CDT October 17, 2015 Tate High School running back Alondo Thompkins carries the ball before being wrapped up by Escambia line backer Shoutrell Hills on Friday at Escambia High. Tate beat Escambia 35-14. Ben Twingley/btwingley@pnj.com Escambia High School running back Jabir Frye leaps to avoid a tackle Friday in a game against Tate High. Tate beat Escambia 35-14. Ben Twingley/btwingley@pnj.com Tate High School quarterback Sawyer Smith locks on to a receiver Friday in a game against Escambia High. Tate beat Escambia 35-14. Ben Twingley/btwingley@pnj.com Escambia High School's Khyri Loveless is wrapped up by the Tate defense on Friday at Escambia High School. Tate beat Escambia 35-14. Ben Twingley/btwingley@pnj.com Tate High School running back Alondo Thompkins works his way through traffic Friday in a game against Escambia High. Tate beat Escambia 35-14. Ben Twingley/btwingley@pnj.com Tate High School quarterback Sawyer Smith hands off to running back Dee Thompson on Friday at Escambia High. Tate beat Escambia 35-14. Ben Twingley/btwingley@pnj.com Tate High School Aggies face off against the Escambia Gators on Friday. Tate beat Escambia 35-14. Ben Twingley/btwingley@pnj.com Escambia High School's Khyri Loveless is wrapped up by the Tate defense on Friday at Escambia High School. Tate beat Escambia 35-14. Ben Twingley/btwingley@pnj.com Tate High School's Jake Henry receives a pass from quarterback Sawyer Smith and runs it back for a touchdown Friday in a game against Escambia High. Tate beat Escambia 35-14. Ben Twingley/btwingley@pnj.com Tate High School quarterback Sawyer Smith and running back Alondo Thompkins celebrate a touchdown Friday in a game against Escambia High. Tate beat Escambia 35-14. Ben Twingley/btwingley@pnj.com Tate High School quarterback Sawyer Smith runs to the end zone to celebrate a touchdown with teammates Friday in a game against Escambia High. Tate beat Escambia 35-14. Ben Twingley/btwingley@pnj.com Escambia High School alumni Preston Hanna, Pensacola Sports Association 1972 Athlete of the Year, is inducted in to Escambia's Hall of Fame on Friday at half time during a game against Tate High School. Ben Twingley/btwingley@pnj.com Tate High School running back Dee Thompson gets tagged by Escambia's Dajonti Donaldson on Friday at Escambia High. Tate beat Escambia 35-14. Ben Twingley/btwingley@pnj.com Escambia High School running back Jabir Frye celebrates a touchdown Friday in a game against Tate High. Tate beat Escambia 35-14.
